roleset.name: practicing, marked by economy
roleset.note: FRUGAL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from frugal.01-j)

example.name: All args
example.text: Saw an old Mercedes estate that looked even bigger than the old Volvo ... 4 cylinder engine which seemed ambitious but I guess it 's frugal on petrol so it 's ok ?
